1:
I will sing of covenant faithfulness and justice;
\q to you, Yahweh, I will sing praises.
2:
I will walk in the way of integrity.
\q Oh, when will you come to me?
\q I will walk with integrity within my house.
\q
5:
I will destroy whoever secretly slanders his neighbor.
\q I will not tolerate anyone who has a proud demeanor and an arrogant attitude.
\q
6:
I will look to the faithful of the land to sit at my side.
\q Those who walk in the way of integrity may serve me.
8:
Morning by morning I will destroy all the wicked from the land;
\q I will remove all evildoers from the city of Yahweh.
